ctags.name: create_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_student(payload: StudentCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: delete_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_student
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_student(student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_students
ctags.signature: ( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )

ctags.name: patch_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: update_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StudentUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
